data.question: What is the capital of France?
data.description: Paris is the capital of France.

data.description: Tokyo is the capital of Japan.

data.description: Seoul is the capital of South Korea.

data.question: What is the capital of the United States?
data.description: Washington, D.C. is the capital of the United States.

data.question: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
data.description: Mars is known as the Red Planet due to its reddish appearance.

data.question: Who wrote the play ‘Romeo and Juliet’?

data.question: What is the largest planet in our solar system?
data.description: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.

data.question: In which country you find Fujain Tulou?
data.description: China joined the International Convention for the Protection of World Cultural and Natural Heritage in 1985 and is home to 57 World Heritage Sites today. Chinese architecture boasts a rich and diverse heritage with its influence extending to countries like Japan, Korea and Mongolia.

data.question: What is the time complexity of a binary search algorithm?
data.description: The time complexity of a binary search algorithm is O(log n).

data.question: Purpose of Recursion in programming?
data.option2: Solve problems by breaking them down.
